description: Lemon verbena (Aloysia citriodora) is an amazing plant species with numerous amazing qualities. It is a perennial shrub that is native to the Mediterranean and South America with aromatic leaves and small, white flowers. It has a lemon scent that is ideal for use in herbal teas, desserts, and sauces. It is known to help with headaches, digestion, and anxiety and it is also an effective insect repellent. Lemon verbena contains high amounts of antioxidants that can help fight aging and boost the immune system. Its leaves are also edible and rich in vitamins and minerals such as calcium and vitamins A, C, and K - offering various health benefits. Overall, lemon verbena is an amazing plant species that is rich in antioxidants and provides many health benefits.
